name: Troll God Mountain
description:
The story is about a troll god who is dropped on a scary forest full of obstacles.

Goblin must find his way back to troll mountain, back to dear home..

Use variety of abilities in order to survive in the darkness. Sneak, run, and throw blueberries to lure the enemies..

..but remember : don’t get detected..!

Dev Team:

Programmer / blueprints
Henri Heikkilä

3D character modelling / animation

Assets / 3D modelling / Visual design
